price: (25) Say, "I do not know if what you are promised is near or if my Lord will grant for it a [long] period."
arabic: قُلۡ إِنۡ أَدۡرِيٓ أَقَرِيبٞ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمۡ يَجۡعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّيٓ أَمَدًا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qul in adrī aqarībun mā tūʿadūna am yajʿalu lahu rabbī amadan
